column4: hello, i am trying to change from windows to ubuntu but i have run into some problems, i wonder if someone can help me out. the problem stems from the fact my cdrom drive is screwed and i cannot boot from cd. i also cannot boot from usb as my bios is too old. (old computer). i wonder if i can install ubuntu from windows, is this possible? please message me privately if you have an idea, thanks in advance.
and that will wipe my windows installation and start the ubuntu install process?
no, it will install it inwindows using a file to simulate a partition
wubi is a test drive more than a long term solution
